_You have %n open ticket in Zammad._::_Y: You have %n open ticket in Zammad.
You have %n open tickets in Zammad.
translations.Integration of Zammad user support/ticke: Integration of Zammad user support/ticketing solution
translations.Zammad integration provides a dashboard:
Zammad integration provides a dashboard widget displaying your important notifications,
	a search provider for tickets and notifications for new open tickets.
translations.Failed to save Zammad admin options: Failed to save Zammad admin options
translations.If you want to allow your Nextcloud user: If you want to allow your Nextcloud users to use OAuth to authenticate to a Zammad instance, create an application in your Zammad admin settings and put the application ID (AppId) and secret below.
translations.Make sure you set the \"Callback URL\" t: Make sure you set the "Callback URL" to
translations.OAuth access token could not be obtained: OAuth access token could not be obtained:
translations.To create an access token yourself, go t: To create an access token yourself, go to the "Token Access" section of your Zammad profile page.
translations.Create a \"Personal Access Token\" and g: Create a "Personal Access Token" and give it "TICKET -> AGENT", "ADMIN -> OBJECT" and "USER_PREFERENCES -> NOTIFICATIONS" permissions.
translations.Warning, everything you type in the sear: Warning, everything you type in the search bar will be sent to your Zammad instance.
